properties.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 11 at 4:07PM AKST until February 12 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7
inches.

* WHERE...Yakutat.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon AKST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will become increasingly wet and heavy
in the morning hours, making it difficult to manage.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON AKST WEDNESDAY
